Pebble
A lightweight, open source, Java EE blogging tool
SourceForge.net project page | Home | pebble-user mailing list
Download
  • Current stable release : Pebble 2.6.2
  • Latest code : /trunk on open.jira.com
Documentation
The documentation here is focussed around getting Pebble installed, configured and running. User documentation is integrated with the Pebble web application and can be accessed by clicking "Help" after logging in.
  • Installation
  • Configuration
  • Single-blog vs multi-blog
  • Security
  • Screenshots
  • Upgrading from 2.x
  • Upgrading from 1.x

The Team

A successful project requires many people to play many roles. Some members write code or documentation, while others are valuable as testers, submitting patches and suggestions.

The team is comprised of Members and Contributors. Members have direct access to the source of a project and actively evolve the code-base. Contributors improve the project through submission of patches and suggestions to the Members. The number of Contributors to the project is unbounded. Get involved today. All contributions to the project are greatly appreciated.

Members

The following is a list of developers with commit privileges that have directly contributed to the project in one way or another.
